name: The Tower (Demo)
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING

Mom is off to work today. I don't know when she'll be back. 

I'm scared, though. Something is wrong with our home. 

There's... hair. Everywhere.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Play as Dani, a young girl whose world gets a little creepier one winter morning. 

KEY CONTROLS:

M1 - interact objects/movement

I - see inventory (no interaction in demo)

ESC - access menu 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Programming/Sprites: robobarbie

Writing/Story Development: Eurydice Rozen

Backgrounds/Sound Design+OST/Story Development: Tavian St. James
